ResearchProjectDef.label: Precision research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn common laws of scientific approach and computation. This is required to research most complex things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Forge improved armor, lighter and sturdier than previous iterations
“All armor has its weaknesses. That doesn't mean you should stop wearing it.” - Elizabeth Carlton

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to construct larger firearms that propell larger material balls with increased accuracy to produce larger destruction.
